value.query: SELECT ActualCost,AmountAllOpportunities,AmountWonOpportunities,BudgetedCost,CampaignMemberRecordTypeId,CreatedById,CreatedDate,Description,EndDate,ExpectedResponse,ExpectedRevenue,Id,IsActive,Name,NumberOfContacts,NumberOfConvertedLeads,NumberOfLeads,NumberOfOpportunities,NumberOfResponses,NumberOfWonOpportunities,NumberSent,OwnerId,ParentId,RecordTypeId,StartDate,Status,Type, LastModifiedDate, CreatedBy.Name,%vlocity_namespace%__EmailTemplate__c,%vlocity_namespace%__MassEmailSubject__c, %vlocity_namespace%__MassEmailContent__c FROM Campaign WHERE Id = '{{params.id}}'
